City Council
============

The public is invited to attend all City Council meetings. Throughout the year there are some cancelled meetings, as well as special meetings and workshops, so be sure to check ahead of time. All City Council meeting notices and agendas are posted on this website as well as at City Hall, 307 N. Mason Street, at least 72 hours prior to meetings.  Meetings are held the 2nd and 4th Tuesday of the month.

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

[Most Recent Agenda](https://www.cityofbowietx.com/Archive.aspx?AMID=36&Type=Recent "Most Recent City Council Agenda") | [View All](https://www.cityofbowietx.com/Archive.aspx?AMID=36 "View All City Council Agendas")  
Agendas are available prior to the meetings.

[Most Recent Minutes](https://www.cityofbowietx.com/Archive.aspx?AMID=37&Type=Recent "Most Recent City Council Minutes") | [View All](https://www.cityofbowietx.com/Archive.aspx?AMID=37 "View All City Council Minutes")  
Minutes are available following City Council approval.

City Council Authority & Responsibilities
-----------------------------------------

The City Council operates under the City Charter adopted by the citizens of Bowie. The City Council is responsible for establishing city policies, considering city ordinances and resolutions, establishing the annual budget to provide services to the public, setting the city tax rate, setting utility rates, and addressing and adopting zoning and planning rules and regulations.
